article_title: When It's OK To Accept A Job You Don't Really Want

article_metadata.description: Belinda? In a cubicle? Is this a harbinger for the End of Days? I guess I won't worry about picking up my dry cleaning. One of my most talented and adventurous friends (I’m calling her Belinda to protect her privacy) is an accomplished photographer, videographer, activist and world traveler with at least [...]
